#summary Keyboard Shortcuts
#labels Featured

=== General ===
|| *Shortcut Key* || *Description* ||
||  F12           ||  Hide/Unhide all buttons ||
||  F11           ||  FullScreen   ||
||  ESC           ||  Undo F12 & F11 ||


=== Navigation (only after hiding buttons)===
|| *Shortcut Key* || *Description* ||
||  Arrow Keys    ||  Move the map ||
||  +             ||  Zoom in      ||
||  -             ||  Zoom out     ||
